testCase.name: Testing get all products tests the base route and returns an array of orders
Testing get all orders tests the base route and returns an array of orders
Testing Insert a new order should return code 200
Test getClientById Should get value from client table
Test getEmployeeById Should get value from employee table
Test checkProductAvailability Should get integer
Test insertOrderProduct Should get orderId
Test getAll from wallet tests the base route and returns an array of wallets
Test update wallet tests the base route and return a wallet updated
Test body validation for wallet update tests the body of req and return with error for body not valid
Test update wallet for valid client tests update of wallet for not valid client and return with error
Test client creation Should return userId
Test body validation of client creation Should return userId
Test getAll from client tests the get from user to filter only clients
Test email that already exists tests the get from user to search the email amoung the registered clients
Test association wallet to new client tests the creation of wallet for new registered client and return id of new wallet
Test update order tests the base route and return an order updated
Test body validation for order update tests the body of req and return with error for body not valid
Test update order for valid employee tests update of order for not valid employee and return with error
Test association order to new client tests the creation of order for new registered client and return id of new order
